dict.string: let mBot move forward. Speed: The speed of the movement, ranging from 0 to 255.
let mBot move backwards. Speed: The speed of the movement, ranging from 0 to 255.
let mBot turn left. Speed: The speed of the movement, ranging from 0 to 255.
let mBot turn right. Speed: The speed of the movement, ranging from 0 to 255.
control the motor rotation. LeftSpeed: left motor speed, ranging from 0 to 255; rightSpeed: right motor speed, ranging from 0 to 255.
let the mBot corresponding LED lights. Item: 0 for the left only light, 1 for the right light only, 2 for all lights; color: select a variety of colors.
let the mBot buzzer play. Tone: .c2 ~ .c8; meter: full tone for .whole, semitone for .half, four divided into .quarter, eight divided into .eighth, six divided into .sixteenth.
Detects the value of the light sensor and returns the light intensity. The range is 0 ~ 980, the greater the greater the value of light intensity.
Detects the value of the ultrasonic sensor and returns the distance reading in centimeters.
Detects the value of the line sensor and returns the status value. 0 for 1 light in the white line, 2 lights in the black line; 3 for the 1,2 lights are On the white line.
You can operate mBot to send any infrared string. String to add "".
wait. Duration: the length of time to wait, in seconds.
